title: John Eric Goff, “Gold Medal Physics: The Science of Sports” (Johns Hopkins UP, 2009)
description:
The instructor of my freshman physics course fit the stereotype of a physics professor: unkempt white hair, black glasses case in the breast pocket of his short-sleeved shirt, thick German accent, and a tendency to mumble to himself while mulling over formula on the chalkboard. I was not his most...
